name: @chickendinosaur/url-parser
description: URL parser to mimic node's 'url'.parse with minimal overhead and max performance.

scripts.benchmark: npm run test && npm run benchmark-url-parser && npm run benchmark-fast-url-parser && npm run benchmark-url
scripts.build: npm run clean && babel src --out-dir lib
scripts.test: npm run build && tape test/unit/**/*.js | tap-spec
